name: GetPausedIncidentReportCounts
description:
Retrieve paused incident reporting counts for a specified period.

This tool fetches reporting counts for paused incident usage within a specific reporting period, with a maximum lookback of 6 months. It is part of the Event Intelligence package or Digital Operations plan. Use this tool to assess incident management efficiency over time.

parameters.name: use_accept_versioning
parameters.description: Specify if the `Accept` header should be used as a versioning header. True to enable.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type_header
parameters.description: Sets the content type for the request; must be 'application/json'.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date for the search range in YYYY-MM-DD format.

value_schema.description: The start of the date range over which you want to search.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date of the reporting period to search for paused incidents. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

value_schema.description: The end of the date range over which you want to search.

parameters.name: filter_by_service_id
parameters.description: Specifies a filter to limit the scope of reporting to a particular service by its ID.

value_schema.description: Specifies a filter to limit the scope of reporting to a particular service

parameters.name: filter_by_suspended_source
parameters.description: Filter response to alerts suspended by Auto Pause or Event Rules.

value_schema.description: Specifies a filter to scope the response to either alerts suspended by Auto Pause or Event Rules.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Pagerduty API.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: The start of the date range over which you want to search.

value_schema.description: The start of the date range over which you want to search.

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: The end of the date range over which you want to search.

value_schema.description: The end of the date range over which you want to search.

parameters.name: service_id
parameters.description: Specifies a filter to limit the scope of reporting to a particular service

value_schema.description: Specifies a filter to limit the scope of reporting to a particular service

parameters.name: suspended_by
parameters.description: Specifies a filter to scope the response to either alerts suspended by Auto Pause or Event Rules.

value_schema.description: Specifies a filter to scope the response to either alerts suspended by Auto Pause or Event Rules.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
